mapper.insert: insert into classmanagement (gradeuser, studenquantity, college_id, gradestate, classroom_id, employee_id) values (#{gradeuser}, #{studenquantity}, #{college.id}, #{gradestate}, #{classroom.id}, #{employee.id})
mapper.update: update classmanagement set state=state^1 where id=#{id}

update classmanagement set gradeuser = #{gradeuser}, studenquantity = #{studenquantity}, college_id = #{college.id}, gradestate = #{gradestate}, classroom_id = #{classroom.id}, employee_id = #{employee.id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select c.id , c.gradeuser , c.studenquantity,d.name d_name, c.gradestate, r.name r_name,e.realname e_realname from `classmanagement` c left join datadictionary d on c.college_id = d.id left join classroom r on c.classroom_id = r.id left join employee e on c.employee_id = e.id

select c.id , c.gradeuser , c.studenquantity,d.name d_name, c.gradestate, r.name r_name,e.realname e_realname from `classmanagement` c left join datadictionary d on c.college_id = d.id left join classroom r on c.classroom_id = r.id left join employee e on c.employee_id = e.id limit #{start},#{pageSize}
